description: I am currently learning more about networking, cybersecurity, web development and cloud. My technologies are HTML5, CSS5, Javascript, PHP, MySQL.

hero.title: Hello I'm Dalila Santiago!
hero.description: I am currently learning more about networking, cybersecurity, web development and cloud. My technologies are HTML5, CSS5, Javascript, PHP, MySQL.

jobs_description.title: Web Frontend Developer
jobs_description.description: I worked at Cicend, where I developed their website from scratch. My responsibilities: structure the content with HTML and CSS, apply PHP and MySQL to manage the database, ensure that the site was responsive and correctly adapted to both mobile devices and large screens through media queries. Additionally, I implemented a folio finder so that users could verify their certifications online

jobs_description.title: Professional Residence
jobs_description.description: I supported the area of taxpayer services by digitizing, organizing and validating official documents, contributing to improving times in internal processes. I developed skills in file management, attention to detail and use of digital tools

jobs_description.title: Season Cashier
jobs_description.description: I provided customer service and cash management, making payments in cash and with a bank terminal, ensuring accuracy and agile service

jobs_description.title: Cashier
jobs_description.description: Responsible for collection and sales registration, as well as cash and card handling. I encouraged efficient customer service, maintaining accuracy in cashier operations and sales floor support when required

projects.title: Pagina Web Cicend Mexico
projects.description: Development and implementation of a website for the Cicend company, in addition to carrying out the basic domain and BDD configuration.

projects.title: ClouD Streaming
projects.description: ClouD Streaming is a university project from the eighth semester (2024) that consists of a website for movies and series. The main focus of the project is the frontend, using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to create an attractive and responsive interface. ‚ö†Ô∏è Project in development: The backend and advanced functionalities are minimally implemented. It mainly showcases the layout and design.

projects.title: Text Encrypter
projects.description: Web application developed as part of the Alura Latam Challenge. The tool allows: Encrypt text using a simple letter substitution algorithm, decrypt previously encrypted text, Easily copy the generated result, The objective is to practice HTML, CSS and JavaScript, applying programming logic and DOM manipulation.

projects.title: Secret Number
projects.description: Secret Number Game is a game within a web page as practiced by Alura Latam, where the system generates a random number between 1 and 10 but this number is secret. To win, the user must try to guess the number by entering theirs in the text box.

contributions.title: TECNM Instituto Tecnologico de Altamira
contributions.description: Graduated from the Computer Systems Engineering degree from the Altamira Technological Institute (2020-2024).

contributions.title: Google Cybersecurity Certificate
contributions.description: I completed the Google Cybersecurity Certificate program through Coursera, where I developed skills in risk analysis, incident management, computer security fundamentals.

contributions.title: Advanced Periodontics
contributions.description: I participated in the Beginner Programming Training program of Alura Latam and Oracle Next Education, in which I reinforced my knowledge in HTML, CSS and JavaScript and good coding practices

about.title: About me
about.subtitle:
üë©‚Äçüíª Systems Engineer
üöÄ Code. Learn. Improve. Repeat.
about.description: Graduated from the Computer Systems Engineering degree, with knowledge in web development, databases and technical support. I have complemented my academic training with internationally prestigious courses, such as the Google Cybersecurity Certificate and the Alura & Oracle Next Education Programming Beginner program. I have practical experience in developing web pages thanks to my collaboration with the company Cicend, where I participated in the creation and management of sites adapted to your needs. I use languages such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP and Java, as well as knowledge of environments such as XAMPP, Linux and Astro. I am characterized by being a responsible, organized person, with initiative and with great interest in continuing to learn and specialize
